code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const quickAccessData=[{title:'ACE Dashboard',description:'Monitor ACE integration flows'},{title:'WAS Dashboard',description:'WebSphere application server status'},{title:'Health Checks',description:'System health monitoring'},{title:'IMIB Health Check',description:'IMIB platform health status'},{title:'Database Dashboard',description:'Database performance metrics'},{title:'Putty Servers',description:'Server connection management'},{title:'HUB01 Dashboard',description:'HUB01 monitoring and metrics'},{title:'HUB03 Dashboard',description:'HUB03 monitoring and metrics'},{title:'ACE Frontends',description:'Frontend application status'},{title:'Health Excel Reports',description:'Download health reports'}];const QuickAccessCards=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mb-8",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 xl:grid-cols-5 gap-4",children:quickAccessData.map((card,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white rounded-lg shadow-md p-5 hover:shadow-xl hover:scale-105 transition-all cursor-pointer",style:{borderLeft:'4px solid #8DE971'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"font-semibold mb-2",style:{color:'#030304'},children:card.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm",style:{color:'#030304',opacity:0.7},children:card.description})]},index))})});};export default QuickAccessCards;
